Description: Fragment of rim, neck and shoulder, with spool attachment of handle, of North Ionian pottery column-krater. Interior of neck glazed with red band lined in white; reserved below. Maeander on top of lip, diagonal strokes on edge and underside glazed. Remains of handle (with vertical grooving) and handle area glazed; pattern of dots and looping line in panel to left, slight traces in preserved in panel to right; light ridge at turn to shoulder.
Curator's comments: Found unregistered. From a piece similar to 1886,0401.1213.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1030)
